name: @deskpro-apps/asana
title: Asana
description: View your Asana tasks linked with Deskpro tickets to streamline communication with users.

access_tokens.title: Personal access token
access_tokens.description: Asana personal access token, please follow the app setup guide to get this

add_comment_when_linking.title: Leave a comment on the task in Asana when it is linked to a ticket in Deskpro

default_comment_on_ticket_reply.title: Ticket reply as comment
default_comment_on_ticket_reply.description: Enable option to add Deskpro replies as task comments when a Asana task is linked to a Deskpro ticket

default_comment_on_ticket_note.title: Ticket note as comment
default_comment_on_ticket_note.description: Enable option to add Deskpro notes as task comments when a Asana task is linked to a Deskpro ticket

add_deskpro_tag.title: Add "Deskpro" label when creating or linking Task
add_deskpro_tag.description: Automatically adding a label to indicate in Asana that the task is currently linked to a Deskpro ticket
